relatedBlades.title: Get the 2023 Gartner® Market Guide for DDoS Mitigation Solutions
relatedBlades.subtitle: Cloudflare recognized as a Representative Vendor
relatedBlades.copy:
The 2023 Gartner® Market Guide for DDoS Mitigation Solutions offers insights for organizations to deflect advanced DDoS threats.

The Recommendations from the report include: 
- Determine the organizational risk level, and pay accordingly for DDoS mitigation services. Organizations at low risk of being targeted with a DDoS attack can save money with less-expensive providers that offer DDoS mitigation as a feature.
- Strongly consider experienced scrubbing center or content delivery network providers if the enterprise is at medium to high risk of being targeted by an attack. If the enterprise requires a content delivery network service for accelerating the delivery of content, then converging services to a content delivery network/DDoS provider is the sensible choice.
- Build operational resiliency, as a dependence on a single provider grows.

![Gartner Market Guide for DDoS Mitigation Solutions Image](//cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/64hNVrwrggfFFEq0Zke8HB/b58cb1041057694cf59fec180dfa3fc6/Figure4.png)
